page.title: 17AGRICULTURE
page.content: It is our intention to give details of several farms in the{LIFTON}area and to offer a synopsis of our findings SAMPLE FARM 1 79 acres,39 cattle,178 sheep and uses local market. SAMPLE FARM 2 30 acres,9 calves,40 chickens,3 cats,1 dog and grows crops. SAMPLE FARM 3 130 lambs,organic farm,beef cattle,sheep (no number mentioned) ,hay making fields,farm owns 190 acres of farming land some crops but mainly grassland,1 cat,25 sheep,2 calves,4 pigs,1 horse,private fishing,beef cattle,sheep,farmer keeps South Devon cows,1 horse,132 beef cattle and sheep. SAMPLE FARM 4 67 young cattle,50 milking cows 180 ewe and lambs,150 acres all grass,
